EVI	
MOD13Q1
Smoothed MODIS time series of EVI were accessed through the online Data Service Platform for Vegetation Indices Processing which is offered by the University of Natural Resources and Life Science (BOKU) in Vienna, Austria

In summary, the found results suggest the choice of raw MODIS time series over Whittaker smoothed vegetation index time series to achieve a high spatial accuracy to predict clear-cut deforestation using BFAST Monitor.

lonlat.mat <- matrix(data = c(-6790774.88,-853140.53,-6786172.69,-847462.74), nrow = 2, byrow = TRUE)
